document.full_text: g8 leaders will discuss aid for north african states after recent popular uprisings and ways to end the conflict in libya at a summit this week, but could get sidetracked by wrangling over who should be the new imf chief.
document.title: g8 to discuss arab spring, imf post could feature
lines_and_colors: g8 leaders will discuss aid for north african states after recent popular uprisings and ways to end the conflict in libya at a summit this week, but could get sidetracked by wrangling over who should be the new imf chief.
